features.title: Modular
features.content: Myg includes a lot of UI elements. Because everyone of them is separately published on NPM, you can just include what you actually use.

features.title: Lightweight
features.content: Mixins > Classes. Myg's CSS classes are entirely optional to minimize file size.

features.title: Opinionated
features.content: Opinionated components prevent you from polluting your DOM.

features.title: Modern
features.content: Myg uses the latest web technologies to support its rich feature set while remaining lightweight.

name: Myg on Rails
description: The opinionated & modular state-of-the-web framework Myg integrated with Ruby on Rails

features.title: Mozaic components
features.content: Making the implementation of complex Myg components dead simple while keeping your views clean.

features.title: Handling themes
features.content: Create different color themes and switch between on the fly. You can even switch automatically for day & night.

features.title: Keeping you organized
features.content: Myg on Rails supports you by generating a set of javascript and style files in which you can customize every aspect of Myg to your liking.
